mapper.insert: INSERT INTO passenger (user_id, name, gender, id_no, phone, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{idNo}, #{phone}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE passenger SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, id_no = #{idNo}, phone = #{phone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM passenger WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, gender, id_no, phone FROM passenger WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
